BREX-IDA360-Q100 v0.1 ID-A360-Q100 Business Rules
01
//cautionRef
ATA 28 Data Modules MUST include a cautionRef element referencing the H2 compatibility caution. Applies to all DMs under ATA chapter 28.
BREX-IDA360-001
//warningRef
Any Data Module containing NH3 (ammonia) content MUST include a warningRef element referencing the NH3 toxicity warning.
BREX-IDA360-002
//proceduralStep/@respTime
ATA 47-40 (Active Suppression) procedural Data Modules MUST include a respTime attribute (in seconds) on all procedural steps.
BREX-IDA360-003
//applic/assert/@applicPropertyValues
All DMs with applicability assertions MUST use only approved variant values: A360-Q100-LH2, A360-Q100-NH3, A360-Q100-N2, A360-Q100-ALL.
BREX-IDA360-004
//dmStatus/@safetyClass
ATA 26, 28, and 47 Data Modules MUST carry safetyClass="SC1" on the dmStatus element.
